modName: Dan Bull - Skyrim Epic Rap -Theme Replacer-
summary: Replaces the drab, boring Main Menu theme with the most Epic Skyrim song ever created!
descriptionHtml:
For those of you who haven\'t heard it, Dan Bull\'s Skyrim Epic Rap is in my opinion one of the BEST possible songs to use as the background music for the Main Menu screen. I\'ll be honest, I don\'t even like rap that much but I am in love with this song.

Here\'s the YouTube link in case you haven\'t already heard it:

[youtube]j50u0zUeCmU[/youtube]

And here is the link to Dan Bull\'s webpage where you can fine more Epic Raps about Video Games and other subjects.

http://itsdanbull.com/

Installation Instruction:
-Nexus Mod Manager-
1. Download with Mod Manager
2. Activate
3. Enjoy the tunes.

-Manual-
1. Download
2. Extract to your Skyrim/Data folder
3. Overwrite existing files if necessary
4. Enjoy the tunes.

Legal crap: I don\'t own this song. I didn\'t help Dan Bull write this song. I\'ve never even met Dan Bull in person but he did give me permission to use his song in this mod. This is all his work, all glory and credits go to him.
author: Dan Bull
